summary: Charts the adventures of the prefab four, possibly the most famous band of all time.
cast: Eric Idle|John Halsey|Ricky Fataar|Neil Innes|Michael Palin|George Harrison|Bianca Jagger|John Belushi|Dan Aykroyd|Gilda Radner|Bill Murray|Gwen Taylor|Ronnie Wood|Terence Bayler|Henry Woolf|Jeannette Charles|Carinthia West|Al Franken|Lorne Michaels|Tom Davis|Frank Williams|Eunice|Barry Cryer|Penelope Tree|Robert Putt|Tania Kosevich|Jerome Greene|Vivienne Cohen|Bob Gibson|Ollie Halsall|Pat Pierre Perkins|Ray Tranter|Bunny May|Debbie Waterson|Mick Jagger|Paul Simon|Roger McGough|David Frost|Ron Gwynne|Cleo Rocos|Ed Sullivan|Gary Weis|Kim Wilde
title: The Rutles: All You Need Is Cash
